item.title: 激进分子野村绫将从 SBI 控股公司获得 6400 万美元的报酬
item.description: 当 SBI 新世界银行有限公司（SBI Shinsei Bank Ltd.）本周开始交易时，日本最富有的女性之一将可能获得 100 亿日元（约合 6400 万美元）的意外之财。【原文：When SBI Shinsei Bank Ltd. starts trading this week, one of Japan’s wealthiest women will likely get a ¥10 billion ($64 million) windfall.】

item.title: 科进集团将以 33 亿美元收购华平投资的工程公司
item.description: 加拿大 WSP Global 公司在其最大股东的资金支持下，达成了从 Warburg Pincus LLC 控制的基金手中收购一家美国工程公司的协议。【原文：Canada’s WSP Global Inc. reached a deal to buy a US engineering firm from funds controlled by Warburg Pincus LLC with the financial backing of its largest shareholder.】

item.title: 英特尔聘用特朗普官员监督政府事务
item.description: 英特尔公司任命罗宾-科威尔（Robin Colwell）为负责政府事务的高级副总裁，由特朗普政府的一名官员负责监管这家芯片制造商与政策制定者和监管机构的关系。【原文：Intel Corp. named Robin Colwell as senior vice president of government affairs, enlisting a Trump administration official to oversee the chipmaker’s relationship with policymakers and regulators.】

item.title: OpenAI 授权迪士尼角色的交易完全是现货交易
item.description: OpenAI 不费吹灰之力就能进入迪士尼王国。【原文：OpenAI is getting access to Disney’s kingdom without cutting a check.】

item.title: 路透社称纳斯达克将寻求证监会批准全天候交易
item.description: 据路透社报道，纳斯达克计划于周一向美国证券交易委员会提交文件，以推出全天候股票交易。【原文：Nasdaq is planning to submit paperwork with the US Securities and Exchange Commission on Monday to roll out round-the-clock trading of stocks, Reuters reports.】

item.title: B.莱利提交逾期报告，为继续列名迈出一步
item.description: B.瑞利金融公司（B. Riley Financial Inc.该股在延时交易中上涨了 20% 以上。【原文：B. Riley Financial Inc. said it filed its overdue second-quarter report with US regulators, bringing the firm closer to satisfying demands from Nasdaq that will keep the stock from being delisted. The shares gained more than 20% in extended trading.】

item.title: 亚洲 Z 世代如何输给中国的 1 万亿美元盈余
item.description: 中国的新经济模式正在危及亚洲 Z 世代的未来。【原文：China’s new economic model is putting the future of Asia’s Gen-Z at risk.】

item.title: 日本央行将把基准利率上调至 1995 年以来最高水平
item.description: 人们普遍预计日本央行行长上田一夫将在周五把日本央行的关键利率提高到三十年来的最高水平。随着政府对廉价融资的需求与日元疲软导致进口价格上涨之间的冲突，未来的道路将变得更加迷茫。【原文：Governor Kazuo Ueda is widely expected to raise the Bank of Japan’s key rate to the highest level in three decades on Friday. The path ahead becomes murkier as the government’s need for cheap financing clashes with a weakening yen that’s driving up import prices.】

item.title: 公民称，预测市场到 2030 年将增长 5 倍
item.description: 公民金融集团公司（Citizens Financial Group Inc.【原文：Prediction markets companies are likely to see their revenues grow by a factor of five to more than $10 billion by 2030, according to analysts at Citizens Financial Group Inc.】

item.title: 纽约称出租车和共享出行保险费率可能上涨 25
item.description: 据了解纽约州计划的人士透露，纽约州官员已告知共享出行公司、司机代表和其他出租汽车行业的人士，未来三年内保险费率将平均上涨 25%，乘客票价可能因此上涨。【原文：New York officials have told rideshare companies, driver representatives and others in the for-hire vehicle industry that insurance policy rates will rise by an average 25% over the next three years, according to people with knowledge of the state’s plans, likely sending passenger fares up as a result.】

item.title: 惠誉称：今年美国银行对竞争对手的贷款激增 26
item.description: 惠誉国际评级公司（Fitch Ratings）的数据显示，美国银行正在向私人信贷公司、私募股权投资公司和对冲基金提供更多贷款，今年截至 11 月，向这些非银行金融机构提供的贷款额增长了 26%。【原文：US banks are lending more to private credit firms, private equity shops and hedge funds, with loan volume to these non-bank financial institutions up 26% this year through November, according to Fitch Ratings.】

item.title: Stone Point 将以 10 亿美元基金加入推动零售财富的行列
item.description: 石点资本公司（Stone Point Capital）正在测试一个约 10 亿美元的基金，希望有朝一日能向富裕人士开放。【原文：Stone Point Capital is testing a roughly $1 billion fund that it hopes to one day open to wealthy individuals, as smaller private-markets firms seek to emulate their larger peers in tapping the multitrillion-dollar retail market.】

item.title: 巴里克夺回马里金矿和三吨黄金
item.description: 在双方于上个月解决了长达数年的争端之后，马里恢复了巴里克矿业公司（Barrick Mining Corp）对卢洛-古恩科托（Loulo-Gounkoto）矿场的控制权，并将向该公司返还三吨黄金。【原文：Mali has restored control of the Loulo-Gounkoto mine to Barrick Mining Corp. and will return three tons of gold to the company after the two sides resolved a years-long dispute last month.】

item.title: 阿根廷中央银行将于 2026 年改变货币带系统
item.description: 哈维尔-米莱（Javier Milei）总统的政府宣布将在明年初改变货币交易带制度，并开始实施储备积累计划。【原文：President Javier Milei’s government announced it will change its currency trading band system and begin a reserve accumulation program at the start of next year.】

item.title: 油轮被扣押后雪佛龙降低委内瑞拉石油价格
item.description: 雪佛龙公司（Chevron Corp）在一艘油轮在加勒比海被美军扣押后，下调了提供给美国炼油厂的委内瑞拉原油价格，全球原油价格也随之走低。【原文：Chevron Corp, lowered the price of Venezuelan crude offered to US refiners after a tanker was seized by American forces in the Caribbean and as global prices drifted lower.】

item.title: 美国石油市场的关键一角正闪现供应过剩的迹象
item.description: 实物交易商密切关注的美国原油市场的一个角落正在发出供过于求的信号，这是全球供应过剩已经蔓延到美国国内的最新迹象。【原文：A corner of the US crude market closely watched by physical traders is signaling oversupply in the latest indication that a global glut has reached domestic shores.】

item.title: 比特币突破 86,000 美元，跌至年内低点
item.description: 比特币两周来首次跌破86,000美元，投资者情绪减弱，最大的加密货币进一步陷入熊市。【原文：Bitcoin dropped below $86,000 for the first time in two weeks with investor sentiment weakening as the largest cryptocurrency slips deeper into bear market territory.】

item.title: CommScope 资产出售后，贷款人要求赔偿 1 亿美元
item.description: CommScope Holding Co.的一些贷款人要求立即偿还贷款，并在该公司出售其关键资产后要求额外支付 1 亿多美元。【原文：Some lenders to CommScope Holding Co. are demanding an immediate repayment of their loans and more than $100 million of additional payout after the company sold its key asset.】

item.title: 法国总统莱斯库雷称参议院预算不足以缩小赤字
item.description: 法国财政部长罗兰-莱斯库雷（Roland Lescure）表示，参议院版本的2026年预算将导致无法接受的巨额赤字，并呼吁在立法者努力争取在年底前稳定财政计划的同时进行重大修改。【原文：French Finance Minister Roland Lescure said the senate’s version of the 2026 budget would lead to an unacceptably wide deficit and called for major changes as lawmakers struggle to stabilize financial plans before year-end.】

item.title: 美联储主席米兰表示，在继任者确定之前，他可能会继续留任
item.description: 美联储理事斯蒂芬-米兰（Stephen Miran）表示，在他的任期于 1 月底届满后，他可能会继续留在央行，直到新的被任命者得到确认来填补他的席位。【原文：Federal Reserve Governor Stephen Miran said he’ll likely remain at the central bank after his term expires at the end of January, until a new appointee is confirmed to fill his seat.】

item.title: 委内瑞拉称周末网络攻击后石油出口系统瘫痪
item.description: 委内瑞拉国家石油公司在上周末遭受所谓的网络攻击后，仍在努力恢复关键的管理系统。【原文：Venezuela’s state oil company is still struggling to restore key administrative systems after what it called a cyberattack that hit over the weekend.】

item.title: 美国就业报告占据中心位置：您需要了解的信息
item.description: 在本周充斥着大量经济数据的情况下，周二的就业报告将成为投资者关注的焦点。【原文：In a week chock full of economic data, Tuesday’s jobs report will take center stage for investors.】

item.title: 西北太平洋地区本周将迎来更多洪涝雨水
item.description: 华盛顿州和西北太平洋地区本周将面临多轮暴雨袭击，该地区洪水风险上升，因为居民们仍在努力应对上周的历史性降雨。【原文：Washington State and the Pacific Northwest are facing multiple rounds of torrential downpours this week, raising flood risks in the region as residents are still grappling with last week’s historic rains.】

item.title: 比尔-格罗斯之子投资俄克拉荷马城足球场项目
item.description: 曾经的债券大王比尔-格罗斯（Bill Gross）的儿子正与 NBA 球星拉塞尔-威斯布鲁克（Russell Westbrook）一起，支持俄克拉荷马城以新足球场为中心的新娱乐区。【原文：The son of one-time bond king Bill Gross is joining NBA star Russell Westbrook in backing a new entertainment district in Oklahoma City anchored by a new soccer stadium.】

item.title: 芯片股符合哈佛大学的泡沫标准股票洞察
item.description: 根据哈佛商学院教授的测算，美国股市最炙手可热的角落之一--芯片制造商，符合泡沫的定义。【原文：One of the hottest corners of the US stock market, chipmakers, meets the definition of a bubble as measured by professors at Harvard Business School.】

item.title: 罗伯-雷纳的儿子尼克在刺死人后被捕
item.description: 周一早些时候，32 岁的尼克-莱纳在其父母--好莱坞导演兼演员罗布-莱纳和米歇尔-辛格-莱纳--去世后被洛杉矶警察局逮捕。【原文：Nick Reiner, 32, was arrested by the Los Angeles Police Department early Monday after the death of his parents, the Hollywood director and actor Rob Reiner and Michele Singer Reiner.】

item.title: 印度星空航空公司考虑购买价值 10 亿美元的巴西航空工业公司喷气机
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，印度最大的支线航空公司星空航空公司（Star Air）正在考虑购买多达 20 架巴西航空工业公司（Embraer SA）的飞机，这将是巴西制造商在增长最快的航空市场之一取得的突破。【原文：Star Air, India’s largest regional carrier, is considering the purchase of as many as 20 Embraer SA aircraft, according to people familiar with the matter, in what would be a breakthrough for the Brazilian manufacturer in one of the fastest-growing aviation markets.】

item.title: 沃尔沃供应商 Luminar 因合同纠纷申请破产
item.description: 为汽车生产激光传感器的 Luminar Technologies Inc 公司在失去与瑞典汽车制造商沃尔沃公司（Volvo AB）的合同后不久申请破产。【原文：Luminar Technologies Inc, which manufactures laser-based sensors for cars, filed for bankruptcy shortly after it lost a contract with Swedish carmaker Volvo AB.】

item.title: 美国对明斯克采取行动后，欧盟加强了对白俄罗斯的制裁
item.description: 就在美国表示将取消对白俄罗斯出口钾肥的限制几天后，欧盟扩大了对白俄罗斯的制裁，这凸显了欧盟和美国对俄罗斯亲密盟友的不同态度。【原文：The European Union expanded sanctions against Belarus, just days after the US said it would lift restrictions on exports of potash from the country, underscoring diverging approaches to the close ally of Russia.】
